TopicTitle: Can you calibrate the Dragon software to work with KSP?

Articles.Content: I've been wondering for a long time now. Is it possible to calibrate the Dragon speech recognition software so that when you are in KSP and say (for example) "stage", your craft stages?

I've been wondering for a long time now. Is it possible to calibrate the Dragon speech recognition software so that when you are in KSP and say (for example) "stage", your craft stages?

As far back as 1998, in my experience, Dragon Dictate was already a formidable and powerful dictation and hands-off computing tool--as early as back then, I was already using it in my classes when I used to teach in university. So I am willing to bet that its latest versions can and will be able to control most aspects of KSP using voice commands.

I think you miss the objective of the OP--he doesn't want chatter, he wants to control KSP with his OWN voice, using Dragon. i.e. he says something like "gear" and the gear will retract or extend, or as he said, "stage" and the staging occurs.
